SELECT g.*,b.`brand_name`,d.grade_name,d.discount_money,d.grade_id FROM goods g INNER JOIN ( SELECT goods_id,SUM(detail_num) AS num,order_id AS oid FROM order_detail GROUP BY goods_id ) o ON g.`goods_id` = o.goods_id INNER JOIN brand b ON g.`brand_id` = b.`brand_id` INNER JOIN category c ON c.`category_id` = b.`category_id` INNER JOIN vip_goods v ON v.goods_id = g.`goods_id` INNER JOIN grade d ON d.grade_id = v.grade_id
d.grade_id = #{gid}
